human germline gene database
============================

All V/D/J genes were obtained from OGRDB

SOURCE: https://ogrdb.airr-community.org/germline_sets/Homo%20sapiens
OGRDB RELEASE DATE: 
  - IGH: 2024-10-12 (rev 9)
  - IGK: 2024-10-12 (rev 4)
  - IGL: 2024-10-12 (rev 3)


All constant genes were obtained from IMGT GENE-DB

SOURCE: https://www.imgt.org/genedb/
